CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 21, 1945, pg. 1 reads: "Bus Driver - Pittsburgh Motor Coach Company's instructor, Roy McKinley, gives Clark Fontaine, 230 Burrows Street, new bus operator trainee, a few pointers about running a bus. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Pittsburgh Motor Coach instructor Roy McKinley, operating bus while unknown man, left, and trainee Clark Fontaine, look on
